metadata.Title: CVE-2022-4337 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
An out-of-bounds read in Organization Specific TLV was found in various versions of OpenvSwitch.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-4337` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

openvswitch-common - 3.0.3-0ubuntu0.22.10.2
openvswitch-ipsec - 3.0.3-0ubuntu0.22.10.2
openvswitch-pki - 3.0.3-0ubuntu0.22.10.2
openvswitch-source - 3.0.3-0ubuntu0.22.10.2
openvswitch-switch - 3.0.3-0ubuntu0.22.10.2
openvswitch-switch-dpdk - 3.0.3-0ubuntu0.22.10.2
openvswitch-test - 3.0.3-0ubuntu0.22.10.2
openvswitch-testcontroller - 3.0.3-0ubuntu0.22.10.2
openvswitch-vtep - 3.0.3-0ubuntu0.22.10.2
python3-openvswitch - 3.0.3-0ubuntu0.22.10.2
No subscription required

notes.Note: mdeslaur> This issue is fixed in (3.0.3-0ubuntu0.22.10.1) in kinetic but is not in the -security pocket.

criterions.comment: openvswitch package in kinetic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.0.3-0ubuntu0.22.10.2').
